price: E, dentre Seus sinais, está que Ele vos criou de pó; em seguida, ei-vos homens, que vos espalhais pela terra.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَنۡ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ إِذَآ أَنتُم بَشَرٞ تَنتَشِرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi an khalaqakum min turābin thumma idhā antum basharun tantashirūna
